mapper.sql: select order_num , min(order_row) as order_row , count(order_num) as order_product_cnt , sum(order_price) as order_price , min(order_date) as order_date , min(to_char(order_date,'yyyy.mm')) as order_month from coffee_order group by order_num order by order_num desc
mapper.select: with order_product as ( )select op.order_month , op.order_date , op.order_num , op.order_price , co.beans_num , case when op.order_product_cnt>1 then co.beans_name || ' 외 ' || (op.order_product_cnt-1) else co.beans_name end beans_name , be.beans_img , co.type_num from coffee_order co join order_product op on co.order_num = op.order_num and co.order_row = op.order_row join coffee_beans be on co.beans_num = be.beans_num order by order_num desc
